name: Cleansing
instructions: Gently wash your face using lukewarm water. Use a cleanser suitable for your skin type.

name: Serum Application
instructions: Apply a few drops of your chosen serum to slightly damp skin. Gently pat until absorbed.

name: Moisturizing
instructions: Take a pea-sized amount of moisturizer and gently massage it onto your face and neck.

name: Sun Protection (SPF)
instructions: This is the most crucial step for daytime. Apply a generous amount of broad-spectrum SPF to your face, neck, and ears as the last step of your routine.

name: Double Cleansing
instructions: First, use an oil-based cleanser to break down makeup/sunscreen. Rinse. Then, follow with a water-based cleanser.

name: Targeted Treatment
instructions: Apply specific treatments for acne or pigmentation to affected areas, or as an all-over treatment if prescribed. Follow product instructions carefully.
